item.title: Frictionless SSH for VS Code Dev Containers on MacOS
item.description: Introduction I wanted to write down how I got a frictionless SSH setup for VS Code Dev Containers on MacOS where I have the necessary keys available, but don’t need to manually unlock them anymore. I can e.g. simply push to GitHub/pull from GitHub from my dev environment inside the container. Setup SSH Key(s) I usually create a separate SSH key pair for every use case. That means my ~/.ssh dir contains a dedicated key for GitHub, which I’ll use as an example in the remainder of the post:
